pullRequest.title: Fixed the issue with missing Auto Logout switch in Advanced Security screen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue being fixed or feature implemented



NMA-660
Related PR's and Dependencies

Screenshots / Videos

How Has This Been Tested?




 QA (Mobile Team)

Checklist:


 I have performed a self-review of my own code and added comments where necessary
 I have added or updated relevant unit/integration/functional/e2e tests

commit.message:
Fixed the issue with missing Auto Logout switch in Advanced Security screen.
Replaced obsolete Switch controls with recommended SwitchCompat

nodes.bodyText: This is the change that actually fixed the issue.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -80,15 +79,15 @@
                     app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0"
                     tools:ignore="ContentDescription" />
 
-                <Switch
+                <androidx.appcompat.widget.SwitchCompat
                     android:id="@+id/auto_logout_switch"
                     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_marginEnd="10dp"
-                    android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
-                    app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/auto_logout_label"
+                    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/auto_logout_label"
                     app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
-                    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/auto_logout_label" />
+                    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/auto_logout_label" />

commit.message:
Fixed the color of activated SwitchCompat to blue
Upgraded constraintlayout library
